argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ablcom.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ablcom.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_cmncom | |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
